reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater well-made and comfortable, appreciating its perfect weight for different seasons and soft, non-scratchy fabric.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely item.
items.body: The fabric is soft and light to wear. I bought a size larger than usual then. machine washed and dried it in the dryer. Fits great now. I was planning to knit one but this one is prettier and cost less than the yarn would have. And I have it NOW. Read more
items.author: Lydia Sarnecka

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy sweater
items.body: Comfy, warm, good fit. This sweater is comfortable and perfect for everyday use. It’s not bulky at all and fits well under my winter coat. The only thing I wish is that it would be a little longer. But that doesn’t take away from all the good points including the price! I like this sweater so much I bought it in 3 colors and it does fit true to size. Read more
items.author: Jeannette Tyas

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Size is questionable
items.body: I bought two sweaters, both medium. While the sage green one was a tad small, the pink one was a full size too large. I ordered a size small in pink and it fits perfectly. I’m wonder if the sage green sweater was sized wrong and don’t know if I should return for a larger size. Afraid it’ll be too large. Otherwise, I love the sweaters. Nice and soft. Will consider buying more. Read more
items.author: carrie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Sweater
items.body: This sweater is a beautiful shade of red. It's not too light weight and not too heavy. It's soft and comfortable. I usually wear between a size14 and 16 and the XL fits perfectly. I'm short (4'11") and wear a 38 G bra. The sweater come to just below the hips. I do have to cuff the sleeves as usual for me. It's a nice quality sweater. I haven't had any pilling so far. I think it's a great value. Read more
items.author: Michelle M.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for daily wear, including the office.
items.body: Excellent sweater! I got it a size larger than usual since I wanted something more roomy, I got a 2x but could have gone a size down to 1x and it would still fit great. I normally wear a size 18 or 20 in Roaman's clothes. Gorgeous color, sleeves were a bit long but easy to turn up. Long too, covers my back end almost entirely. Very very stretchy, so it could be clingy in smaller sizes. Very comfortable. My only minor issue is the neckline which is almost a scoop neck and not a crew neck. I'll be looking for more colors. Read more
items.author: RM

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful sweater/Late Delivery
items.body: The only reason this is getting 3 stars is because my daughter loves this sweater and it fits her perfectly. Not only did it come a day late, it came right after we returned from our family photo shoot. We needed it for this. Thank goodness I had an alternative in my closet. I ordered this well before Thanksgiving so it should not have been an issue. Shout out to customer service for taking my calls and being kind, but it did not get me my item any sooner. Read more
items.author: Mangaj

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars High End Looking GORGEOUS Sweater!!!
items.body: This sage green/silver cable knit sweater is GORGEOUS! The color is elegant and timeless. The sweater is lightweight, and the cable knit is well made and looks high quality. I love the style, washability, and I do not see pilling to be an issue. The sizing is generous, and this will be a staple in my wardrobe. I like this sweater so much, I am purchasing more as gifts for loved ones for the holidays. Excellent sweater!!! Read more
items.author: Kristin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater
items.body: Solid sweater for the price. Little thin, but it is marketed as lightweight. Washes and dries well. True to size. Read more
items.author: Storm

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Chestnut Brown Heather, Gold, Bright Pink, Camel Heather, Light Grey Heather, Dark Olive, Burgundy, Black, Sage Green Heather, Dark Red, Dark Green, Red, Oatmeal Heather, Navy. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
